name: Superchain Eco S8
description: This pilot campaign will test our new campaigns feature and reward the most active Super Users of Season 8 with a share of OP tokens provided by the Superchain Eco team.
participate_description: Due to campaign set-up only deposits in your EOA wallets connected to your account will earn rewards. Perks earned by your account (incl multipliers) will be activated on all wallets you have connected.
more_info:
The Superchain Eco Season 8 Campaign is the first campaign to leverage the new campaign feature and will reward the most active Super Users of Season 8.

**How to participate**  
All Season 8 badges included in this campaign allow you to earn Superchain Points that count toward this campaign's leaderboard. Follow the guidelines for each badge to earn them.

**How rewards will be calculated**  
At the end of the campaign, a snapshot will be taken of the total Superchain Points per account in this campaign. This snapshot will be used to finalize a calculation that distributes the campaign budget to all participants. In this pilot campaign, only users with over 500 campaign-specific points will be eligible to receive rewards.
